column4: so after running sudo apt-get upgrade how can I confirm there are no more updates to install? Would doing sudo apt-get upgrade again install everything all over again?
no, it's set
safe bu t not needed
was it a kernel upgrade?
I'm not sure all I did was sudo apt-get update and then sudo apt-get upgrade
check right hand top corner does it say reboot to finish upgrade? or just the normal logout, shutdown etc
normal reboot/shut down
no need to reboot then
set it to blank
can you point me how?
for the keyring? is it already set with a password?
I think yes. Password and Encryption keys has one category - Password: Login with 2 entries: vino and Network secret for my wifi
system preferences passwords and encryption keys?
Yes
sudo apt-get install sensors-applet
yes but it doesn't show the Ati GPU temperatures if installed from the repos
it needs to be compiled manually for the Ati GPU temperatures to show
